name: はじまりの季節 ～居酒屋冬物語～
summary: The protagonist's relationship with his girlfriend is not doing very well. She's even being courted by his boss! In an effort to rekindle their love, he takes her on a vacation to a ski resort. But will that be enough to win back her heart?
info:
• 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1998-05-29
  • 発売: R.A.N Software
